definitions.definition: A recess or projection , with a dome or vault , at the east end of a church ; an apse .
Either of the points in the elliptical orbit of a planet , comet , or moon where it is closest or furthest from the body it orbits; examples are perihelion , aphelion , perigee , and apogee

main_definition: ( architecture ) A recess or projection , with a dome or vault , at the east end of a church ; an apse .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) Either of the points in the elliptical orbit of a planet , comet , or moon where it is closest or furthest from the body it orbits; examples are perihelion , aphelion , perigee , and apogee
